data.comment: The match is underway at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
Bielefeld are in shooting range from this free kick.
Joakim Nilsson (Bielefeld) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Bielefeld.
Freiburg's Nicolas Hofler gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bielefeld defender.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Freiburg.
In the minute 8, Nils Petersen (Freiburg) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Bielefeld defenders.
Lucas Holer gets his shot on target but fails to score for Freiburg.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 12, Harm Osmers awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
Freiburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 15, Can Freiburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bielefeld's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 16, Important block from the Bielefeld defence as Manuel Gulde fires in a strike for Freiburg.
Freiburg are caught offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Bielefeld in Freiburg.
In the minute 20, Harm Osmers awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Bielefeld.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
In the minute 21, Manuel Gulde (Freiburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
In Freiburg Bielefeld drive forward through Sven Schipplock. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Nils Petersen for Freiburg drives towards goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
At Schwarzwald-Stadion, Freiburg are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 24, Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Freiburg's Lucas Holer has been booked in Freiburg.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Harm Osmers signals a Freiburg throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Freiburg's Christian Gunter breaks free at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 36, Free kick Freiburg.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 39, Freiburg's Lucas Holer gets in a shot on goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Freiburg apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Nils Petersen. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Bielefeld needs to be cautious. Freiburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 42, Freiburg drive upfield and Nils Petersen gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bielefeld defender.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
Harm Osmers blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Bielefeld push upfield but Harm Osmers quickly pulls them for offside.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 49, Nils Petersen (Freiburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Freiburg, Freiburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Bielefeld.
In the minute 51, Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Harm Osmers signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Bielefeld's area.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 53, Freiburg's Vincenzo Grifo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Bielefeld close to the penalty box.
Harm Osmers awards the home team a throw-in.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Freiburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Freiburg's Vincenzo Grifo gets in a shot on goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 59, Freiburg's Nils Petersen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
Throw-in Freiburg.
Uwe Neuhaus (Bielefeld) is making a first substitution, with Sergio Cordova replacing Cebio Soukou.
In the minute 62, Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
In the minute 66, In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bielefeld have a dangerous throw-in.
Nicolas Hofler (Freiburg) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Bielefeld's Joakim Nilsson attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Harm Osmers awards Freiburg a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Can Bielefeld capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
Christian Streich is making the team's first substitution at Schwarzwald-Stadion with Roland Sallai replacing Lucas Holer.
In the minute 71, Free kick Freiburg.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In Freiburg Bielefeld attack through Anderson Lucoqui. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Bielefeld just outside Freiburg's area.
Sven Schipplock (Bielefeld) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Bielefeld.
The home team replace Jonathan Schmid with Lino Tempelmann.
Ermedin Demirovic is replacing Nils Petersen for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 78, Freiburg have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Vincenzo Grifo gives Freiburg the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
Vincenzo Grifo (Freiburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Bielefeld advance rapidly upfield but Harm Osmers blows for offside.
The away team have replaced Marcel Hartel with Nils Seufert. This is the third substitution made today by Uwe Neuhaus.
Christian Gebauer is on a sub for Sven Schipplock for Bielefeld.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 86, Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Woo-yeong Jeong is replacing Vincenzo Grifo for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Harm Osmers awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Uwe Neuhaus (Bielefeld) is making a fourth substitution, with Sebastian Muller replacing Anderson Lucoqui.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Goal! Freiburg extend their lead to 2-0 through Woo-yeong Jeong.
